backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a mascot image update affecting MissionSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing navigation, sections, footer, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/zen/Footer.tsx: Footer with logo, quick links, social links, and smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/zen/HeaderNav.ts: Responsive header with scroll detection, navigation links, and mobile menu.
Hero section with headline, CTA buttons, stats, and background gradient.
frontend/src/components/zen/MissionSecti: Mission section featuring mission text, uploaded mascot image, and four feature cards.
frontend/src/components/zen/RoadmapSecti: Displays project roadmap phases using cards and a grid layout with titles and bullet items.
frontend/src/components/zen/TokenSection: Shows the ZEN token contract address with copy functionality and basic token metadata and links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, state handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and global utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/assetPath.ts: Builds base-aware asset URLs to ensure correct loading when deployed under subpaths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and extended utilities based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, features, known issues, and versioning for the ZEN website. Notes deployment failures and tracks existing feature requirements and visual/structure guidelines.
